title: Dangerous Honor
description: Life is complicated when you’re a simple maid by night who’s won some royal hearts… and a dragon shifter male knight by day, despised by those same royals.I’m in love with two brothers who are sworn enemies. The dragon shifter and heir to the throne, Jaik… and his disgraced brother Caldren, leader of the rebels.And possibly, I’m just a little bit in love with twin brothers who are my sworn enemies.But I don’t have time to unravel the tangled lies and knots of love surrounding us all, because we’ve been assigned to hunt down the Lord of the Scourge, the man leading the cursed masses who are destroying our kingdom.And all the while, these men I love are increasingly suspicious about who I really am… What will happen to us all when they discover the knight they treat so cruelly is also the woman they love?
author: May Dawson
